title: Baker Mayfield, Colts, Raiders, Dolphins, & where Colin was right & wrong
itunes:title: Baker Mayfield, Colts, Raiders, Dolphins, & where Colin was right & wrong
description:
Colin explains why Cleveland Browns QB Baker Mayfield didn't play well against the Oakland Raiders, why the Indianapolis Colts shouldn't be criticized for their loss, why the Miami Dolphins failed again, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Peter King, DeAngelo Hall, and Tony Gonzalez.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
